name: CLKFullColorImageProvider
desc: A full-color image displayed by a complication.

items.name: init(fullColorImage: UIImage)
items.desc: Creates an image provider with the specified full-color image.

items.name: init(fullColorImage: UIImage, tintedImageProvider: CLKImageProvider?)
items.desc: Creates an image provider that produces full-color and tinted images.

items.name: var tintedImageProvider: CLKImageProvider?
items.desc: An image provider that produces alternative images for tinted graphic complications.

items.name: var accessibilityLabel: String?
items.desc: A succinct label that identifies the purpose of the image.
